title: Why Grok is first and foremost a disinformation machine
subhead: Grok, the chatbot that has been integrated into the X social network and aims to rival ChatGPT, has recently spread Holocaust denial and false information about the November 2015 attacks in France. It was a reminder that Elon Musk's tool, far from being neutral, was designed to misinform.

title: François Hollande: 'Trump's plan reduces Europe's role to a besieged bystander'
